org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class GroupApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.GroupApi

public class GroupApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ Group API.

This class provides access to the Groups within the HQ system. Each of the methods in this class return Response objects that wrap the result of the method with a ResponseStatus and a ServiceError that indicates the error if the response status is ResponseStatus.FAILURE.

getGroup

public GroupResponse getGroup(java.lang.String name)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Get a Group by name.

Parameters:
name - The group name to search for.
Returns:
On ResponseStatus.SUCCESS, the User by the given name is returned via GroupResponse.getGroup().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

getCompatibleGroups

public GroupsResponse getCompatibleGroups()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
List all compatible Groups. A compatible group is a group where all members of the group have the same ResourcePrototype.

Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if all the groups were successfully retrieved from the server.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

getMixedGroups

public GroupsResponse getMixedGroups()
                              throws java.io.IOException
List all mixed Groups. A mixed group is a group where the members will have different ResourcePrototypes.

Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if all the groups were successfully retrieved from the server.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.
